summary.para: Gets display text from an enumeration information structure.

param.name: ppszDisplay
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the display text.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets an enumeration type from an enumeration information structure.

param.name: penumtype
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to one of the values listed below that indicate the enumeration type.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a minimum value from an enumeration information structure.

param.name: ppropvarMin
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the minimum value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a set value from an enumeration information structure.

param.name: ppropvarSet
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the set value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a value from an enumeration information structure.

param.name: ppropvar
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the property value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that extract data from enumeration information. gives access to the enum and enumRange elements in the property schema in a programmatic way at run time.
